symbols.name: sap.fe.templates
symbols.description: Library providing the official templates supported by SAP Fiori elements.

symbols.name: sap.fe.templates.ExtensionAPI
symbols.description: Common Extension API for all pages of SAP Fiori elements for OData V4.

methods.name: addDependent

parameters.name: oControl
parameters.description: Control to be added as dependent

methods.description: Add any control as a dependent to this Fiori elements page.

methods.name: getModel

parameters.name: sModelName
parameters.description: Name of the model

methods.description:
Get access to models managed by Fiori elements.
The following models can be accessed:
  • undefined: the undefined model returns the UI5 OData v4 model bound to this page
  • i18n / further data models defined in the manifest
  • ui: returns a UI5 JSON model containing UI information. Only the following properties are public, don't rely on any other property as it might change in the future
    • editMode: contains either 'Editable' or 'Display'
.

methods.name: loadFragment

parameters.name: mSettings

id.name: id
id.description: The id of the fragment itself

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the fragment to load

controller.name: controller
controller.description: The controller to attach to the fragment

parameters.description: The settings object

methods.description: Load a fragment and go through the template preprocessor with the current page context.

parameters.name: sTarget
parameters.description: Name of the target route

parameters.name: oContext
parameters.description: Context instance

methods.name: removeDependent

parameters.name: oControl
parameters.description: Control to be added as dependent

methods.description: Remove a dependent control from this Fiori elements page.

methods.name: updateAppState

returnValue.description: resolved with the new app state object

methods.description: Triggers an update of the app state. Should be called if the state of a control, or any other state relevant information, was changed.

symbols.name: sap.fe.templates.ExtensionAPI.editFlow
symbols.description: ExtensionAPI that provides methods related to editFlow.

methods.name: invokeAction

parameters.name: sActionName
parameters.description: The name of the action to be called

parameters.name: vContext
parameters.description: One or array of contexts, null in case of an unbound action

parameters.name: mParameters

label.name: label
label.description: a human-readable label for the action

parameters.description: contains the following attributes:

methods.description: Invokes a bound or unbound action.

methods.name: securedExecution

returnValue.description: A Promise that is rejected, if execution is prohibited, and settled equivalent to the one returned by fnFunction.

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be executed. Should return a promise that is settled after completion of the execution. If nothing is returned, immediate completion is assumed.

parameters.name: mParameters

set.name: set
set.description: Triggers a busy indication during function execution. Can be set to false in case of immediate completion.

check.name: check
check.description: Checks whether the application is currently busy. Function is only executed if not. Has to be set to false, if function is not triggered by direct user interaction, but as result of another function, that set the application busy.

updatesDocument.name: updatesDocument
updatesDocument.description: This operation updates the current document without using the bound model and context therefore draft status is updated in case of draft and user has to confirm cancelling the edit

parameters.description: Parameters to define the preconditions to be checked before execution

methods.description: Secured execution of the given function. Ensures that the function is only executed when certain conditions are fulfilled.

symbols.name: sap.fe.templates.ExtensionAPI.intentBasedNavigation
symbols.description: ExtensionAPI providing edit flow related methods.

methods.name: navigateOutbound

parameters.name: sOutbound
parameters.description: Identifier to location the outbound in the manifest

parameters.name: mNavigationParameters
parameters.description: Optional map containing key/value pairs to be passed to the intent

methods.description: Navigates to an Outbound provided in the manifest.

symbols.name: sap.fe.templates.ListReport.ExtensionAPI
symbols.description: Extension API for list reports on SAP Fiori elements for OData V4.

methods.name: refresh

returnValue.description: Resolved once the data is refreshed or rejected if the request failed

methods.description: Refreshes the List Report. This method currently only supports triggering the search (by clicking on the GO button) in the List Report Filter Bar. It can be used to request the initial load or to refresh the currently shown data based on the filters entered by the user. Please note: The Promise is resolved once the search is triggered and not once the data is returned.

methods.name: setFilterValues

parameters.name: sConditionPath
parameters.description: the path to the property as condition path

parameters.name: sOperator
parameters.description: the operator to be used (optional) - if not set, the default operator (EQ) will be used

parameters.name: vValues
parameters.description: the values to be applied

methods.description: Set the filter values for the given property in the filterbar. The filter values can be either a single value or an array of values. Each filter value must be represented as a string corresponding to the given operator.

symbols.name: sap.fe.templates.ObjectPage.ExtensionAPI
symbols.description: Extension API for object pages on SAP Fiori elements for OData V4.

methods.name: refresh

returnValue.description: Resolved once the data is refreshed or rejected if the request failed

parameters.name: vPath
parameters.description: Path or array of paths referring to entities or properties to be refreshed. If omitted, the whole object page is refreshed. The path "" refreshes the entity assigned to the object page without navigations

methods.description: Refreshes either the whole object page or only parts of it.

methods.name: showSideContent

parameters.name: sSubSectionKey
parameters.description: Key of the Side Content fragment as defined in manifest.json

parameters.name: bShow
parameters.description: Optional boolean flag to show / hide side content

methods.description: Displays / Hides the Side Content of an Object Page Block.

symbols.name: sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.controller.Fcl
symbols.description:
Application developers should use this controller for the sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.view.Fcl view.

This controller and its associated view provide the entry point for your application when using the flexible column layout in SAP Fiori elements. When used, you should declare a sap.f.routing.Router as `router` in your application manifest.

methods.name: extend

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class

methods.description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.controller.Fcl with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.controller.RootContainerBaseController.extend}.

symbols.name: sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.controller.NavContainer
symbols.description:
Application developers should use this controller for the sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.NavContainer.Fcl view.

This controller and its associated view provide the entry point for your application when using the classic full page layout in SAP Fiori elements. When used, you should declare a sap.m.routing.Router as `router` in your application manifest.

methods.name: extend

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class

methods.description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.controller.NavContainer with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.fe.templates.RootContainer.controller.RootContainerBaseController.extend}.
